snippet: Standing 6 feet 6 inches in his cowboy boots, John Craig once seemed a granite pillar of this Rocky Mountain ranching and resort town.    A leading real estate developer, he built ski area condominiums, joined the Chamber of Commerce and was nearl...
lead_paragraph: Standing 6 feet 6 inches in his cowboy boots, John Craig once seemed a granite pillar of this Rocky Mountain ranching and resort town. A leading real estate developer, he built ski area condominiums, joined the Chamber of Commerce and was nearly elected to the State Legislature as a Republican. A natural athlete and outdoorsman, he skied with his six children and hunted elk with John Love, then Colorado's Governor.
abstract: Funeral of Yvonne McCurdy-Hill, Heaven's Gate cult member who died in mass suicide in California, described; photo (M)

headline.main: For Cowboy in Cult, Long Ride Into Sunset
headline.kicker: DEATH IN A CULT: THE CONVERT
